meta_description: Explore art classes, exhibits, and community events at Pacific Art League in Palo Alto. Join us to embrace creativity and connect with fellow artists.
admission_text:
# **Join a Thriving Art Community**

[ Join Today ](https://pacificartleague.arlo.co/register?sgid=28385b36b5f54c7e976b155937a122ef)

### **Member Benefits**

Members enjoy many valuable benefits – but did you know that your membership also benefits others? Your membership dollars make our great exhibits, community outreach, school programs and scholarships possible! **PAL’s annual membership runs from the date of renewal for a period of one year.**

We value your support of our mission which is to provide an environment for advancing the expression, appreciation, and enjoyment of the arts for all and we are delighted that you are part of our exciting future!

Join the Pacific Art League and take advantage of our valuable member benefits:

#### **  
10% discount on most classes**

#### **Free Admission to PAL Speaker Series Talk**

#### **Free Open Studio time at PAL**

#### Exhibitions

Participation and (1) free submission in the annual Members Exhibition. Discounted exhibition fees and generous commission on gallery art sales.

#### **  
Free annual subscription to Content Magazine**

(valued at $42)  
Non-profit quarterly print publication featuring the innovative & creative people of Silicon Valley published by SVCreates. Value at $45  
  
Enjoy Content Magazine printed quarterly and delivered directly to your home. Content Magazine is the ultimate addition to your coffee table or living room. Every issue profiles our most innovative and impactful neighbors, announcing n...
collections_text:
# A Creative Community in the Heart of Palo Alto

[ Sign up for our newsletter ](https://go.levitate.ai/?s=c550rTdgTZ&source=customSurvey)

[ ](/classes)

### Classes & Workshops

Experience the delight of making art in your ideal setting. Join our studio for in-person classes, connecting with fellow artists.

[ Explore Art Classes ](/classes)

[ ](https://www.pacificartleague.org/classes?2-traversablecategories=12)

### Community Art Events

Experience the joy of creativity at PAL’s free community art events—open to all and designed to spark connection, curiosity, and self-expression. 

[ View Upcoming Events ](/community-events)

[ ](https://www.pacificartleague.org/classes?2-traversablecategories=2)

### 104 Anniversary Exhibit

Join us as we celebrate a remarkable milestone—104 years of nurturing and showcasing artistic talent at the Pacific Art League! 

[ Celebrate with us ](/104anniversary)

#### OUR MISSION

## **The Pacific Art League inspires and nurtures the growth of individuals and communities in the Bay Area by providing access to transformative creative experiences through art.**

[ ](/calltoartists-abstraction)

### Become a PAL Member

Members enjoy many valuable benefits – but did you know that your membership also benefits others? Your membership dollars make our great exhibits, community outreach, school programs and scholarships possible! **Pacific Art League membership is $100. Members receive 10% off classes and other benefits.**
